summary: An accomplished developer with 8+ years experience building solutions, augmenting technical teams, and consulting for clients ranging from early-stage startups to established enterprises

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Mobile/Web Developer
experience.description: Worked with a diverse set of multi-national clients of all sizes on a variety of web/mobile apps, notable examples include:

projects.name: Kaotim
projects.client: Digital insurance platform for Malaysia's 2nd largest insurance provider
projects.description: As the lead mobile developer, built the app counterpart for their online insurance platform while providing support for the web-based version when required. Took initiative to establish best practices in both the codebase and project management processes

projects.name: RHB Bank
projects.client: One of the top 5 financial institutions in Malaysia
projects.description: Participated in the development leading up to the launch of their new internet banking platform, while spearheading the process of refactoring out-dated legacy code to improve the site's stability and scalability. Additionally, provided leadership and mentorship for their in-house development team

projects.name: BonusLink
projects.description: Assisted in the development of their redesigned website, which significantly increased customer interactions post-launch, according to user analytics. To facilitate multiple partnered promotional sites, the app was created as a monorepo (via Turborepo)

projects.name: Wimyx
projects.description: Launched the first iteration of their app which allowed users to record and upload videos of concerts then seamlessly switch between enhanced and regular audio tracks during playback. FFMPEG was heavily utilised for many features on this project, and live streaming was briefly implemented as a proof-of-concept for future iterations

projects.name: Homeboxx
projects.description: Headed the development of their partner mobile app, which was used to remotely activate secure lockboxes. Additionally, implemented the endpoints and back-end logic for OTP generation and SMS (Via Twilio)

projects.name: Top Glove
projects.description: Created a super-app for workforce management with location-based task distribution, voice calling, and instant messaging. The tracking system was achieved using a combination of GPS, Wi-Fi proximity, and bluetooth beacons which could ping off mobile devices to provide accurate distances

projects.name: Oslo Mikrobuldring
projects.description: As a full-stack developer, implemented Stripe payment integration with subscription-based models for a mobile application.

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.description: Deployed and maintained enterprise e-learning solutions
highlights: Worked with many large corporations including DBS Bank, Allianz, Hartalega & Great Eastern Life
Hosted training seminars for in-house teams of up to 30 members

personalProjects.title: Team Q Swim
personalProjects.companyDescription: Booking management system for a local swim school
personalProjects.description: As a full-stack developer, built and deployed this booking and attendance-tracking application independently
highlights: Utilised React Native for the front-end, and the AWS suite for the back-end, leveraging DynamoDB as the database
Implemented user profile management with role-based access control
Currently curated for administrative use, with a customer facing app planned for future release

personalProjects.title: ShapeLink
personalProjects.description: Created a mobile puzzle game, pursued as both a passion project and a hands-on learning initiative.
highlights: Developed using the Unity game engine with C# scripting, and python for the supplementary functions
Implemented in-app purchases and advertisements for monetization
Published to both App Store and Google Play Store, and met with positive user reviews
